description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play the best Avatar Bowling game and have tons of fun with up to four of your friends. Will you get the best score to reach the top of the on-line high score board. Make a perfect game and be the best avatar bowling player of the world.
